room_title: Escape room "Pirates of the Dark Sea" by Just Escape in New York
room_description: Avast, ye Mateys! You and your crew of scallywags tried to steal the treasure of the infamous pirate captain, David S. Calabaza. As a result, you have been thrown into the hold of his ship, The Plunder. Now you must free yourselves from the hold, steal the hidden treasure, and escape The Plunder before Captain Calabaza finds out and has you all thrown overboard into the deep dark sea. Be quick, he will return in 60 minutes, and the sharks are ready for dinner.
